translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The Dhamma Section in Pairs, according to Antecedents

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)🔽8.22. Saññojanasampayuttaduka🔽Nasaññojanasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  saññojana sampayutta duka  na saññojana sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saññojana sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The dyad on fetters associated with …🔽With a conditionally-arisen dhamma associated with a fetter as its condition there arises a conditionally-arisen dhamma associated with a fetter.

original: Nasaññojanasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Nasaññojanasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto🔽ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Nasaññojanavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na saññojana sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  na saññojana sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saññojana sampayuttaḥ ca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ  ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  na saññojana vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a conditionally-arisen dhamma associated with a fetter as its condition there arises a conditionally-arisen dhamma dissociated from a fetter.🔽With a conditionally-arisen dhamma associated with a fetter as its condition there arise a conditionally-arisen dhamma associated with a fetter and a conditionally-arisen dhamma dissociated from a fetter.

original: Nasaññojanavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Nasaññojanavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto
analyzed: na saññojana vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saññojana sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  na saññojana vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na saññojana sampayuttaḥ ca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ
translated: With a conditionally-arisen dhamma dissociated from a fetter as its condition there arises a conditionally-arisen dhamma dissociated from a fetter.🔽With a conditionally-arisen dhamma dissociated from a fetter as its condition there arises a conditionally-arisen dhamma associated with a fetter.

With a conditionally-arisen dhamma dissociated from a fetter as its condition there arise a conditionally-arisen dhamma associated with a fetter and a conditionally-arisen dhamma dissociated from a fetter.

analyzed: na saññojana sampayuttañca na saññojana vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na saññojana sampayuttaḥ
translated: With an object that is connected with the fetters and with an object that is unconnected with the fetters …

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanasampayuttañca nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ🔽paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanasampayuttañca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na saññojana sampayuttañca na saññojana vippayuttañca dhamma  paṭicca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na saññojana sampayuttam ca
translated: With an object that is connected with the fetters and with an object that is unconnected with the fetters …

original: nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanasampayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto🔽ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saññojana vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na saññojana sampayuttaḥ ca na saññojana vippayuttaḥ  ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: With an object that is connected with the fetters and with an object that is unconnected with the fetters …🔽(In detail.)🔽Nine in the cause, six in the object, …🔽Five in the dominant, one in the result, …

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha pe adhipatiyā pañca pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
